summary.para:
The TOKEN_ACCESS_INFORMATION structure specifies all the information in a token that is necessary to perform an access check.
Note This structure doesn't contain token claim information. Applications that support conditional expression access control entries (ACEs) should not use this structure for verifying access. For information about access validation support for conditional expressions, see the and functions.

member.name: TOKEN_ACCESS_INFORMATION.SidHash
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that specifies a hash of the token's security identifier (SID).

member.name: TOKEN_ACCESS_INFORMATION.RestrictedSidHash
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that specifies a hash of the token's restricted SID.

member.name: TOKEN_ACCESS_INFORMATION.Privileges
member.summary: A pointer to a structure that specifies information about the token's privileges.

member.name: TOKEN_ACCESS_INFORMATION.AuthenticationId
member.summary: A structure that specifies the token's identity.

member.name: TOKEN_ACCESS_INFORMATION.TokenType
member.summary: A value of the enumeration that specifies the token's type.

member.name: TOKEN_ACCESS_INFORMATION.ImpersonationLevel
member.summary: A value of the enumeration that specifies the token's impersonation level.

member.name: TOKEN_ACCESS_INFORMATION.MandatoryPolicy
member.summary: A structure that specifies the token's mandatory integrity policy.

member.name: TOKEN_ACCESS_INFORMATION.Flags
member.summary: Reserved. Must be set to zero.

summary.para: The app container number for the token or zero if this is not an app container token.
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 and Windows Vista: This member is not available.
The app container SID or NULL if this is not an app container token.
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 and Windows Vista: This member is not available.
Pointer to a structure that specifies a hash of the token's capability SIDs.
Windows Server 2008 R2, Windows 7, Windows Server 2008 and Windows Vista: This member is not available.

member.name: TOKEN_ACCESS_INFORMATION.TrustLevelSid
member.summary: The protected process trust level of the token.

summary.para: Reserved. Must be set to NULL.
Prior to Windows 10: This member is not available.
